public class CWScriptable
extends com.conceptwave.scripting.Object

The base class for all ConceptWave scriptable object. Does not have constructor. Only objects of derived classes can be created in scripts. The script object itself does not use the check flags. However many other scriptable object use them and in order to avoid converting CwfCheckFlags to interface (which will ad considerable repeating code in many classes) we derive CW script object from check flags.
